Description: Fragment of the rim of black figure painted pottery situla. Part of tail and back of a dog.
Curator's comments: Does not belong to BM GR 1888,0208.18 (S. Weber).
Bibliographic references: CVA British Museum 8 / Corpus Vasorum Antiquorum: Great Britain 13, British Museum 8 (Pl. GB 604, 7 (and Pl. GB 597, 13)) (Group C17)
Weber 2012 / Untersuchungen zur archaischen griechischen Keramik aus anderen ägyptischen Fundorten (TD 257)
